name: Space Sector
description:
Spacebar - Confirm , Buy 

WASD / Arrow Keys - Move your SpaceShip cursor

The Aliens prepare their assault, and they arrive in large numbers !
Prepare your defences by building your armada of space ships.

A retro-arcade style game made for the game jam "Curious Game Jam 2020"

We hope you will enjoy and have fun with this little game :D

Devorange - Programmer / Game Designer

Meistuko - Pixel Artist

MiamLesChocapics - Music / Sound Design

CRT Shader for Godot by henriquelsalves
